1670940.name: SYNCHRONIZERS: UNDEAD MARINES - DEMO
1670940.description:
Synchronizers: Undead Marines.
This is the first game of an amazing saga in a wonderful narrative universe.
This is a high-quality three-lane tower defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows.
This is a twist of the Tower Defense genre, keeping what we all love and including interesting mechanics, characters, loads of action and an incredible soundtrack!

Features:

- An emblematic story with wonderful characters, in the journey of increasing consciousness.
- An incredible and original soundtrack composed by Ale Navarro with the collaboration of modern and emergent musicians to boost the gameplay emotion.
- A weather system to change the mood of the game and refresh visually the different scenarios.
- More than twenty units to build your army of avatars and different strategies
- A Pranic Garden to let the player grow extraterrestrial trees and some animals to take care of.
- A Store to buy and upgrade your skills using in-game currency.
- An underground depot to develop technologies and gather units.
- More than 50 levels (with different lengths) in several planets with some secrets and amazing bosses.
- A unique command center (which must be protected) to take your decisions and get immersed in the story

Coming soon!
SYSTEM REQUIRE
1670940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
